EmailTemplate.name: BK Dealer Referral GMS
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}; CASE-{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The part number you have requested is a unique BendixKing service part which are only available for sale to authorized BendixKing Repair Partners.
If you have a BendixKing LRU that you'd like to have repaired, please reach out to one of these authorized Repair Partners listed at this link:
List of Repair Partners: https://bendixking.com/en/pages/repair-partners
If you'd like to have Honeywell repair or exchange your part, any BendixKing dealer can help work with us to complete your request. You can search for your nearest BendixKing dealer at the following link:
Dealer Search: https://bendixking.com/en/pages/find-a-dealer
Thank you,
BendixKing Customer Support
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
